Class BaseExample

  • java.lang.Object
    • table.BaseExample
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Callable<Void>, Example
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrayIndexExample, ChildTableExample, ComplexFieldExample, IndexReadAndWrite, MapIndexExample, SelectExample, ShardKeysExample, SimpleReadWriteExample, TTLExample

    public abstract class BaseExample
extends Object
implements Example
    Derivable base implementation for table examples.
